channel.title: Histogram Analysis on Chief Dennis' Blog

item.title: Steganography techniques and usage of S-Tools
item.description: In this project we will explore how we can serve TCP/IP data coming in through an open port, and turn it into a virtual serial port or COM port. In this case, I have a router that has an internal GPS that can serve the NMEA sentences to a given IP and port via TCP/IP. However, most programs that use GPS (like Google Earth) do it through a COM port. So, how can we ’translate’ the TCP/IP data into a serial COM stream?
